jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
We are looking for an experienced Product Research professional to join our growing GoFood Research team at Gojek. The Research team provides key insights to aid in the developing and execution of product design, marketing and communication, and overall operational and business strategy. This requires a combination of strong technical research capability complemented by strong business acumen and organizational prowess. 

The ideal candidate can balance both numeric and creative skills, is a strong communicator, and works well in a cross-functional, team-oriented structure. This role will sit within an embedded Research team for a specific Product vertical, reporting directly to the Research Lead for that product. The role is responsible for delivering key insights that will be used to inform overall product development strategy, with key stakeholders including Product Managers, UX Designers, and Developers.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Execute product research to provide inputs throughout the product development process 
  • Employ best practices for product research in collaboration with COE at Gojek 
  • Conduct product evaluation research, employing both qualitative and quantitative methods 
  • Manage product research projects E2E: Briefing, Development, Execution, Sharing 
  • Conduct deep-dive ethnographic and other qualitative work to understand tensions related to a particular product category or issue 
  • Work closely with Market research peer to ensure Product & Market insights are fused throughout the business and product development process

• Holding minimum Bachelor's Degree in HCI, Psychology, Computer Science or other relevant fields
  • Min 2 years experience or more in the field of UX Design, Product Research, UX Research
  • Knowledgeable and experienced with basic UX and qualitative methodologies
  • Has conducted research that addresses one of the following: identifying consumer tensions/barriers/blockers, assessing product user issues, experimental designs, product evaluation
  • Has proven track record of designing, executing, and sharing research on User experience
  • Hands-on experience in managing E2E UX Research projects: Briefing, Execution, Sharing
  • Preference will be given to applicants who have worked with cross functions -- such as Product Manager, Designers, and Engineers.
  • Ability to identify biases from different research techniques and advise to avoid them
  • Must be currently residing in Indonesia
